name: Ambulance Highway Traffic Racer
description:
Are you fed up with simple traffic racing games?
Ambulance Racer is a game for those who are crazy about racing, ambulance traffic racer is a milestone to use genre of endless arcade racing on positive side. Become a Ambulance driver and show your driving skills to save a life, Ambulance Racer is the most realistic game which uses the real-time vehicle physics and traffic in very beautiful environment. Keep an eye on your fuel and keep catching coming fuel packs.

Now its time to hit the road and accept a daring life saving challenge!

FEATURES of the Ambulance Racer:

-Stunning HD graphics
-Real gravity and physics
-Amazing Sounds
-Intelligent traffic system
-Car Drive on the highway traffic city
-
GAME PLAY INSTRUCTIONS

- Touch brake button to slow down
- Tilt to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
